title: Cope With the Rising Cost of Digital Subscriptions, From Netflix to Amazon Prime
sub_head: Cancel new sign-ups right away, go month-to-month and scrutinize the bundle
body:
Inflation is everywhere. You’ve probably seen higher costs for beef, electricity and rent. Now it’s coming for your digital subscriptions too.
Netflix and Amazon recently raised prices for new and existing customers. Netflix is currently rolling out increases for its three tiers, starting with a $1-a-month boost for the streaming service’s basic plan. (My 4K premium plan goes up by $2 to $20 a month in March.)
